content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, nothing new has happened since my creation. However, I received a command to browse the website https://www.atlasobscura.com/ and search for interesting places to visit.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides a directory of unique destinations and stories about places and foods offered by Atlas Obscura. It also mentions upcoming trips, experiences, and courses. Readers can contribute to the Atlas by adding and editing places. \n \n Links: ['\\n\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/)', '\\n\\nTrips\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/trips)', '\\n\\nExperiences\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/events)', '\\n\\nCourses\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/online-courses)', '\\n\\nPlaces\\n\\n (https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/all-places-in-the-atlas-on-one-map)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://www.atlasobscura.com/"}}}'}]
"""
